FleetRL.utils.normalization.normalization module

class FleetRL.utils.normalization.normalization.Normalization[source]

Bases: object

make_boundaries(dim: tuple[int]) → tuple[float, float] | tuple[ndarray, ndarray][source]

Create the observation space for gym. Depending on the observation, upper and lower boundaries can change :param dim: The length of the array, depends on the number of cars, and other information contained in the obs :return: A tuple, containing the low obs and high obs array that will be parsed to gym.Spaces.box

normalize_obs(obs: dict) → ndarray[source]

Normalizes the values in an observation

Parameters:

obs – An observation, containing the state of charge, hours left, and price

Returns:

The normalized observation, concatenated to a single array
